name: VOXEL BATTLE (Ayush-Gala)
description:
Instructions:

You are a spaceship shooting down asteroids with specially equipped lasers. The goal is to survive as long as you can. The more asteroids you break, the more points you get.

CONTROLS:

PC: Use left and right arrow keys to move the player horizontally. Laser beams are shot periodically.

Android: Tap the left half of the screen to move left and the right half to move right. Laser beams are shot periodically. 

NOTE: The frequency of the falling asteroids and lasers increases as the game progresses.

ENJOY !!
